verses.verse: This then was the lot <WH1486> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> by their families <WH4940>; even to the border <WH1366> of Edom <WH123> the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> southward <WH5045> was the outermost part <WH7097> of the south coast <WH8486>.
And their south <WH5045> border <WH1366> was from the shore <WH7097> of the salt <WH4417> sea <WH3220>, from the bay <WH3956> that looks <WH6437> southward <WH5045>:

And it went out <WH3318> to the south side <WH5045> to Maaleh <WH4610>–acrabbim, and passed <WH5674> along to Zin <WH6790>, and ascended up <WH5927> on the south side <WH5045> unto Kadesh <WH6947>–barnea, and passed <WH5674> along to Hezron <WH2696>, and went up <WH5927> to Adar <WH146>, and turned about <WH5437> to Karkaa <WH7173>:

From there it passed <WH5674> toward Azmon <WH6111>, and went out <WH3318> unto the river <WH5158> of Egypt <WH4714>; and the goings out <WH8444> of that coast <WH1366> were at the sea <WH3220>: this shall be your south <WH5045> coast <WH1366>.

And the east <WH6924> border <WH1366> was the salt <WH4417> sea <WH3220>, even unto the end <WH7097> of Jordan <WH3383>. And their border <WH1366> in the north <WH6828> quarter <WH6285> was from the bay <WH3956> of the sea <WH3220> at the outermost part <WH7097> of Jordan <WH3383>:

And the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> to Beth <WH1031>–hogla, and passed <WH5674> along by the north <WH6828> of Beth <WH1026>–arabah; and the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> to the stone <WH68> of Bohan <WH932> the son <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>:

And the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> toward Debir <WH1688> from the valley <WH6010> of Achor <WH5911>, and so northward <WH6828>, looking <WH6437> toward Gilgal <WH1537>, that is before <WH5227> the going up <WH4608> to Adummim <WH131>, which is on the south side <WH5045> of the river <WH5158>: and the border <WH1366> passed <WH5674> toward the waters <WH4325> of En <WH5885>–shemesh, and the goings out <WH8444> there were at En <WH5883>–rogel:

And the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> by the valley <WH1516> of the son <WH1121> of Hinnom <WH2011> unto the south <WH5045> side <WH3802> of the Jebusite <WH2983>; the same is Jerusalem <WH3389>: and the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> to the top <WH7218> of the mountain <WH2022> that lies before <WH6440> the valley <WH1516> of Hinnom <WH2011> westward <WH3220>, which is at the end <WH7097> of the valley <WH6010> of the giants <WH7497> northward <WH6828>:

And the border <WH1366> was drawn <WH8388> from the top <WH7218> of the hill <WH2022> unto the fountain <WH4599> of the water <WH4325> of Nephtoah <WH5318>, and went out <WH3318> to the cities <WH5892> of mountain <WH2022> Ephron <WH6085>; and the border <WH1366> was drawn <WH8388> to Baalah <WH1173>, which is Kirjath <WH7157>–jearim:

And the border <WH1366> turned about <WH5437> from Baalah <WH1173> westward <WH3220> unto mountain <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, and passed <WH5674> along unto the side <WH3802> of mountain <WH2022> Jearim <WH3297>, which is Chesalon <WH3693>, on the north side <WH6828>, and went down <WH3381> to Beth <WH1053>–shemesh, and passed on <WH5674> to Timnah <WH8553>:

And the border <WH1366> went out <WH3318> unto the side <WH3802> of Ekron <WH6138> northward <WH6828>: and the border <WH1366> was drawn <WH8388> to Shicron <WH7942>, and passed along <WH5674> to mountain <WH2022> Baalah <WH1173>, and went out <WH3318> unto Jabneel <WH2995>; and the goings out <WH8444> of the border <WH1366> were at the sea <WH3220>.

And the west <WH3220> border <WH1366> was to the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220>, and the coast <WH1366> there <WH1366>. This is the coast of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> round about <WH5439> according to their families <WH4940>.

And unto Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> he gave <WH5414> a part <WH2506> among <WH8432> the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, according <WH413> to the commandment <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068> to Joshua <WH3091>, even the city <WH7151> of Arba <WH704> the father <WH1> of Anak <WH6061>, which city is Hebron <WH2275>.
And Caleb <WH3612> drove <WH3423> there the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Anak <WH6061>, Sheshai <WH8344>, and Ahiman <WH289>, and Talmai <WH8526>, the sons <WH3211> of Anak <WH6061>.
And he went up <WH5927> there to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Debir <WH1688>: and the name <WH8034> of Debir <WH1688> before <WH6440> was Kirjath <WH7158>–sepher.
And Caleb <WH3612> said <WH559>, He that strikes <WH5221> Kirjath <WH7158>–sepher, and takes <WH3920> it <WH5414>, to him will I give Achsah <WH5915> my daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802>.
And Othniel <WH6274> the son <WH1121> of Kenaz <WH7073>, the brother <WH251> of Caleb <WH3612>, took <WH3920> it <WH5414>: and he gave him Achsah <WH5915> his daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802>.

And it came to pass <WH935>, as she came unto him <WH5496>, that she moved him to ask <WH7592> of her father <WH1> a field <WH7704>: and she got off <WH6795> her donkey <WH2543>; and Caleb <WH3612> said unto her <WH559>, What would you?

She answered <WH559>, Give <WH5414> me a blessing <WH1293>; for you have given <WH5414> me a South <WH5045> land <WH776>; give <WH5414> me also springs <WH1543> of water <WH4325>. And he gave <WH5414> her the upper <WH5942> springs <WH1543>, and the nether <WH8482> springs <WH1543>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> according to their families <WH4940>.

And the outermost <WH7097> cities <WH5892> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> toward the coast <WH1366> of Edom <WH123> southward <WH5045> were Kabzeel <WH6909>, and Eder <WH5740>, and Jagur <WH3017>,
And Kinah <WH7016>, and Dimonah <WH1776>, and Adadah <WH5735>,
And Kedesh <WH6943>, and Hazor <WH2674>, and Ithnan <WH3497>,
Ziph <WH2128>, and Telem <WH2928>, and Bealoth <WH1175>,
And Hazor <WH2674>, Hadattah <WH2675>, and Kerioth <WH7152>, and Hezron <WH2696>, which is Hazor <WH2674>,
Amam <WH538>, and Shema <WH8090>, and Moladah <WH4137>,
And Hazar <WH2693>–gaddah, and Heshmon <WH2829>, and Beth <WH1046>–palet,
And Hazar <WH2705>–shual, and Beer <WH884>–sheba, and Bizjothjah <WH964>,
Baalah <WH1173>, and Iim <WH5864>, and Azem <WH6107>,
And Eltolad <WH513>, and Chesil <WH3686>, and Hormah <WH2767>,
And Ziklag <WH6860>, and Madmannah <WH4089>, and Sansannah <WH5578>,
And Lebaoth <WH3822>, and Shilhim <WH7978>, and Ain <WH5871>, and Rimmon <WH7417>: all the cities <WH5892> are twenty <WH6242> and nine <WH8672>, with their villages <WH2691>:
And in the valley <WH8219>, Eshtaol <WH847>, and Zoreah <WH6881>, and Ashnah <WH823>,
And Zanoah <WH2182>, and En <WH5873>–gannim, Tappuah <WH8599>, and Enam <WH5879>,
Jarmuth <WH3412>, and Adullam <WH5725>, Socoh <WH7755>, and Azekah <WH5825>,
And Sharaim <WH8189>, and Adithaim <WH5723>, and Gederah <WH1449>, and Gederothaim <WH1453>; fourteen <WH702> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Zenan <WH6799>, and Hadashah <WH2322>, and Migdal <WH4028>–gad,
And Dilean <WH1810>, and Mizpeh <WH4708>, and Joktheel <WH3371>,
Lachish <WH3923>, and Bozkath <WH1218>, and Eglon <WH5700>,
And Cabbon <WH3522>, and Lahmam <WH3903>, and Kithlish <WH3798>,
And Gederoth <WH1450>, Beth <WH1016>–dagon, and Naamah <WH5279>, and Makkedah <WH4719>; sixteen <WH8337> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Libnah <WH3841>, and Ether <WH6281>, and Ashan <WH6228>,
And Jiphtah <WH3316>, and Ashnah <WH823>, and Nezib <WH5334>,
And Keilah <WH7084>, and Achzib <WH392>, and Mareshah <WH4762>; nine <WH8672> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Ekron <WH6138>, with her towns <WH1323> and her villages <WH2691>:
From Ekron <WH6138> even unto the sea <WH3220>, all that lay near <WH3027> Ashdod <WH795>, with their villages <WH2691>:

Ashdod <WH795> with her towns <WH1323> and her villages <WH2691>, Gaza <WH5804> with her towns <WH1323> and her villages <WH2691>, unto the river <WH5158> of Egypt <WH4714>, and the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220>, and the border there <WH1366>:
And in the mountains <WH2022>, Shamir <WH8069>, and Jattir <WH3492>, and Socoh <WH7755>,
And Dannah <WH1837>, and Kirjath <WH7158>–sannah, which is Debir <WH1688>,
And Anab <WH6024>, and Eshtemoh <WH851>, and Anim <WH6044>,
And Goshen <WH1657>, and Holon <WH2473>, and Giloh <WH1542>; eleven <WH259> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Arab <WH694>, and Dumah <WH1746>, and Eshean <WH824>,
And Janum <WH3241>, and Beth <WH1054>–tappuah, and Aphekah <WH664>,
And Humtah <WH2547>, and Kirjath <WH7153>–arba, which is Hebron <WH2275>, and Zior <WH6730>; nine <WH8672> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Maon <WH4584>, Carmel <WH3760>, and Ziph <WH2128>, and Juttah <WH3194>,
And Jezreel <WH3157>, and Jokdeam <WH3347>, and Zanoah <WH2182>,
Cain <WH7014>, Gibeah <WH1390>, and Timnah <WH8553>; ten <WH6235> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Halhul <WH2478>, Beth <WH1049>–zur, and Gedor <WH1446>,
And Maarath <WH4638>, and Beth <WH1042>–anoth, and Eltekon <WH515>; six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Kirjath <WH7154>–baal, which is Kirjath <WH7157>–jearim, and Rabbah <WH7237>; two <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
In the wilderness <WH4057>, Beth <WH1026>–arabah, Middin <WH4081>, and Secacah <WH5527>,
And Nibshan <WH5044>, and the city of Salt <WH5898>, and En <WH5872>–gedi; six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.

As for the Jebusites <WH2983> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> could <WH3201> not drive them out <WH3423>: but the Jebusites <WH2983> live <WH3427> with the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> at Jerusalem <WH3389> unto this day <WH3117>.
